title: Drop of FPS on Mac
body:
Recently after a lol update, on MAC i had a huge FPS drop. 
I always played with 125+, but suddenly after a lol update a dropped 60 in lane, 35 on TF.
Updated all iOS system, always played on Medium Graphics, VSync Off, nothing change. 
Is it possible that it's becouse of lol patch?
CPU is compoletely free, the same for HDD, i dont use a lot that PC, so i expect to play as I always did.
I've already followed FPS troubleshooting guide.
Thx.

replies.body:
Is your Mac feeling hot at all? Heat can cause big issues for your performance overall, especially in a match. I recommend checking out our [**Heat & You guide**](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=EFrZbViFqf8), featuring our very own *Digital Ram!*

Let me know if this caused any change.
